docs.snippet: Brazil followed its biggest rival Argentina, down the exit ramp at the Copa America on Sunday, losing to Paraguay on penalty kicks after the teams played a scoreless tie.

docs.snippet: The shock wasn't that Brazil lost to Paraguay in the Copa América, but in how it lost, without scoring a goal, even though the match went to a penalty shootout.

docs.snippet: This capital city, which celebrates its bicentennial this year, is elevating its cultural imprint by adding new museums and expanding older ones. A new museum, above, has opened in an abandoned prison.
